name: Doug
description: Doug's hot dogs will extend your friends' shelf life.

gadgets.name: Double Sausage
gadgets.description: The next Snack Attack only heals allies but doubles the amount.

gadgets.name: Extra Mustard
gadgets.description: The next Snack Attack only damages enemies but doubles the amount.

starpowers.name: Fast Food
starpowers.description: Resurrected targets gain increased movement speed for 3 seconds after being resurrected.

starpowers.name: Self Service
starpowers.description: Snack Attack also heals Doug by 20% of the normal value.

tips: Doug's short range limits his offensive and defensive capabilities, but he has enough range to attack enemies and heal allies that are at at most a tile behind walls, which he can use to his advantage by attacking enemies and healing allies behind walls. This strictly limits throwers that can otherwise take cover behind walls.

When aiming to defeat a specific enemy or group of enemies, Doug can simply use his Super and charge towards the group to attack, because getting defeated under the effects of the Super will not drop any collectibles that puts his team in a losing situation. Make sure to take note of the duration of his Super when using this strategy.

history.description: Doug became available to play in the Training Cave.
Doug and his Draco skin were added to the game.
His Super can now go through walls.
Doug's Super now allows himself or allies to respawn with full health (from 50%).
Doug's Super charge rate was decreased slightly.
All Brawlers' health and damage were increased from 5% to 10% with each Power Level.
Doug's Super range was increased to 9.33 tiles (from 6.67), and its width was increased to 1.33 tiles (from 0.33).

attack.name: Snack Attack
attack.description: Fresh food for friends, expired for others. Heals allies and damages enemies the closer they are to you.

super.name: Second Serving
super.description: A special spiced up hot dog for a target ally or Doug himself. When a buffed Brawler is defeated, they will come back with 100% health after a short delay.
